subject: [R] AIC for lrm(Hmisc/Design) model.
body:
Dear all,

I am adjusting a Logistic Regression Model using lmr() function of Hmisc/Design package. Now I would like to compute AIC for this model. How can I do that?

Kind regards,

miltinho
Brazil
